Name: 快速查到物品狀態
Reminders: 可借/已借/維修 一眼睇到,

Name: Borrow record
Reminders: 清楚記錄借用人+到期日,清楚知道「邊個借咗」「幾時到期」,

Name: 減少漏記/重覆/唔一致,統一資料格式，避免 Excel 亂
Reminders: 減少漏記/重覆/唔一致,統一資料格式，避免 Excel 亂

Name: Travel insurance
Reminders: Print or save digital copy of policy

Name: Driver’s license (if required)
Reminders: Ensure it's valid; check if IDP is needed

Name: Macbook Air charger
Reminders: Pack in laptop sleeve or carry-on

Name: iPhone charger
Reminders: Pack extra cable (in case of damage)

Name: Toothbrush - electronic
Reminders: Check battery or charge before packing

Name: Conditioner - travel packs
Reminders: Pack only enough for trip duration

Name: Tweezers
Reminders: Keep in checked luggage if sharp

Name: Contact lenses (extra pair)
Reminders: Pack in lens case for easy access

Name: Contact lens solution
Reminders: Ensure <100ml for carry-on (or pack in checked bag)

Name: Extra plastic bags
Reminders: For dirty clothes or wet items

Name: Pen + notepad
Reminders: Keep one pen in carry-on for forms

Name: House keys
Reminders: Keep in a secure, easily accessible pocket

Name: Anti-Histamine
Reminders: Pack in a pillbox or small container

Name: Panadol
Reminders: Bring a few tablets in a travel pill case

Name: Water bottle
Reminders: Carry empty for airport security, refill later

Name: SPF/Sunscreen
Reminders: Pack one for face & body, ensure <100ml for carry-on

Name: Face mist (travel size) - travel size
Reminders: Keep in ziplock to avoid leaks

Name: Cotton pads
Reminders: Pack in small container or ziplock

Name: Make up remover
Reminders: Use travel-size micellar water or wipes

Name: Sheet masks
Reminders: Pack in flat pouch to save space

Name: Eyebrow pencil
Reminders: Sharpen before packing or bring a sharpener

Name: Foundation
Reminders: Use travel-size container or cushion compact

Name: Hair ties
Reminders: Pack a few extra (in case some get lost)

Name: Earrings
Reminders: Use a small jewelry pouch or organizer

Name: Sunglasses
Reminders: Pack in a hard case to avoid scratches

Name: Basic jewellery
Reminders: Carry minimal pieces to avoid loss

Name: Claw clips
Reminders: Place in a small ziplock to prevent damage

Name: Socks - 1 extra pair for airport travelling
Sneakers
Reminders: Clean before packing, wear on flight if bulky
